title: Problem 2114_D
statement: The game field is a matrix of size 10^9 × 10^9, with a cell at the intersection of the a-th row and the b-th column denoted as (a, b).There are n monsters on the game field, with the i-th monster located in the cell (x_i, y_i), while the other cells are empty. No more than one monster can occupy a single cell.You can move one monster to any cell on the field that is not occupied by another monster at most once .After that, you must select one rectangle on the field; all monsters within the selec
